document.full_text: a wyoming couple says in a federal lawsuit filed on tuesday that a computer they leased from a national rent-to-own firm allowed the company to secretly spy on them.
document.title: wyoming couple says company spied on customers
lines_and_colors: a wyoming couple says in a federal lawsuit filed on tuesday that a computer they leased from a national rent-to-own firm allowed the company to secretly spy on them.
